name: ETHIOPIAN AMERICAN CIVIC COUNCIL
description: The Ethiopian American Civic Council (EACC) is a US-based, nonprofit organization.
sampleDescriptions: The Ethiopian American Civic Council (EACC) is a US-based, nonprofit organization that represents over 750,000 Ethiopian Americans in all 50 states. The EACC is interested in utilizing its diverse US-
